bio:
Hello, I am Tyler Synott

I am a programmer focusing on making games

I aspire to make a game that can live rent free in at least one persons head, for about 3 years. But in all seriousness I do wish to create games that many people can enjoy in some way shape or form. 

I find the process of making games interesting, in how 2D and 3D are so similar yet different in the processes, and even more interestingly how the VR process works.

And I wish to one day be in the process of making a game that ends up being very popular.
